body.p: Which one of the following best describes how data is sent on a network?

multiple_choice.choice: Data is sent one byte at a time.
Data is sent one bit at a time.
Data is sent in packet groups of bytes.
Data is sent one typed letter at a time.

response.feedback: Data is sent in a grouping much larger than one byte.
Data is sent in a grouping much larger than one bit.
Data is sent in a group of bytes called a "packet".
Data is sent in a grouping much larger than a single typed letter.
